Description: Displays a list of all available commands with descriptions.
LLM_Context: The 'commands' command provides a summary of all bot commands and their functionalities to help users understand available features.

Description: Provides detailed help for a specific command using LLM context.
LLM_Context: The 'command_help' command retrieves an in-depth explanation of the command's functionality and purpose from the LLM, assisting users in understanding how the command works.

Description: Closes your private help channel with Devros.
LLM_Context: The 'bye' command terminates the user's private channel created for detailed command help sessions, ending the ongoing LLM interaction.

Description: Ask your AI server a question and receive a response.
LLM_Context: The 'ask' command sends a user's question to the AI server and returns a natural language response generated by the LLM. Server members can ask any question they would ask any other LLM by using `!ask` followed by their question.

Description: Sends a game invite to the general chat to encourage other server members to join.
LLM_Context: The 'invite' command generates a game invitation embed in the general chat, facilitating multiplayer game sessions by notifying the selected user.

Description: Provides a list of all avalible dice members can roll
LLM_Context: Provides a list of all avalible dice server members can roll. Dice include a d4, d6, d12, and d20 dice and this command just lists them all
